p: We omitted bioclimatic variables 8–9 and 18–19 from analysis, in light of known spatial artifacts in those four variables. The remaining of 15 variables were subjected to a principal components analysis (PCAs) to reduce the dimensionality of our models and avoid multicollinearity of variables (see summary of variable correlations in S2 File). The component loadings in the present-day data were used to transform future-climate data, using the ENMGadgets package [ 27] in R version 3.2.0 [ 28].
